job_duties_1: As an IT manager my duties, encompass a wide range of responsibilities, primarily focused on overseeing a company's information technology infrastructure and operations. This includes managing IT staff, developing and implementing IT policies, managing budgets, ensuring system security, and troubleshooting technical issues. I played a key role in strategic planning, aligning IT initiatives with business goals, and staying abreast of new technologies.
